definitions.definition: a male person or animal that has already been mentioned or is easily identified

examples.text: Everyone liked my father—he was the perfect gentleman.
He *(= the man we are watching)* went through that door.

definitions.definition: a person, male or female, whose sex is not stated or known, especially when referring to somebody mentioned earlier or to a group in general

examples.text: Every child needs to know that he is loved.
He who *(= anyone who)* hesitates is lost.

wordOrigin: Old English he, hē, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch hij.
